title: Can't use my Temporary Emote and Mastery Emote
body:
So I got the Amumu Temporary Emote and in game it works perfectly, though I don't know how do I use my Master Emote, because Mastery Emote 
(ctrl 6) does not work and instead of it Amumu Temporary Emote shows up. I need help. 
Sincere TinoTino.

replies.body: You use the emote for the summoner icon you have equipped, so you'd need to unequip the Amumu icon to show your mastery banner.  The Snowdown icons are temporary and should be gone by the 14th.  Let me know if that clears things up!
